accessDeniedMessage: You are not authorized to view the page you were trying to access. Please contact a Guardian Connector administrator to change your role in order to view this page.
authMessage: Please sign up or log in to access this application
browserDoesntSupportAudio: Sorry, your browser does not support the audio element
browserDoesntSupportVideo: Sorry, your browser does not support the video element
clickOnAlertsForMoreInfo: Click on alerts for more information
filterOutValuesFromColumn: Which values to filter out from the column
galleryNotAvailable: GuardianConnector Explorer Gallery is not available. Please activate media embedding
ifYouAreZoomedOutAlertsWillBeShownAsA: If you are zoomed out, alerts will be shown as a
loginError: An error occurred while trying to log in
mapbox3d: Do you want to enable 3D terrain?
mapLegendLayerIds: Layer IDs to show in the map legend
mapeoCategoryIds: Mapeo Category IDs to show on the alerts map
mostRecentAlertsShownIn: Most recent alerts shown on map in
passwordIncorrect: The password you entered is incorrect
pleaseMatchFormat: Por favor, siga el formato esperado
recentAlertsDate: Date of most recent alerts published
removeTableAreYouSure: Are you sure you want to remove this table
restrictView: Do you want to restrict this view?
restrictViewDescription: When restricted, only Member and Admin users can access this view. Viewer users will be redirected to the home page.
tableRemovedNote: Note: this does not delete the table from the database. It only removes any views configuration for the table
visibilityHelpText: Choose who can view this view.
visibilityMembersDescription: Only signed-in users with the Member or Admin role can view.
visibilityAdminsDescription: Only signed-in users with the Admin role can view.
visibilityPublicDescription: Anyone with the link can view.
visibilityViewerDescription: Any signed-in user (Viewer, Member, or Admin) can view.
visibilityRequired: Please select a visibility level for this dataset.
yourAccessIsPending: Your access is pending. Please contact a Guardian Connector administrator for account approval.
